bibl.title: Two Coptic Ostraca in the Brigham Young University Collection.
bibl.note: Brigham Young University acquired in the late 1970s and early 1980s a modest collection of Coptic papyri, parchments and ostraca from Aziz Atiya of the University of Utah. Two ostraca [Coptic, with a few words in Greek] are edited here. - 1. BYU inv. Coptic Ostracon 70. Notification for the Sending of Some Sacks. Wadi Sarga, VII-VIII cent. - 2. BYU inv. Coptic Ostracon 71. Order for the Delivery of Wine. Bawit, VIII cent.
bibl.seg: 142.13 O. Brigham Young Univ. Inv. Copt. 70; 71
Lincoln H. Blumell, Two Coptic Ostraca in the Brigham Young University Collection.

Brigham Young University acquired in the late 1970s and early 1980s a modest collection of Coptic papyri, parchments and ostraca from Aziz Atiya of the University of Utah. Two ostraca [Coptic, with a few words in Greek] are edited here. - 1. BYU inv. Coptic Ostracon 70. Notification for the Sending of Some Sacks. Wadi Sarga, VII-VIII cent. - 2. BYU inv. Coptic Ostracon 71. Order for the Delivery of Wine. Bawit, VIII cent.
